item.title: [Publication] Design and Implementation of Credit Evaluation System for Healthy Aged Service

item.description: I am a sophomore major in software engineering at Tianjin Normal University, Tianjin, China. I am a core member of iOS Club. Besides, I am a key member of the Cognitive and Affective Computing Lab at my TJNU, advised by Prof. Ziping Zhao.
